prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Nelson County (Va.) Land Records, 1808-1932. Local government records collection, Nelson County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These volumes came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court records from Nelson County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Nelson County was formed in 1807 from Amherst County. The county was named for Thomas Nelson, Jr., governor of Virginia from June to November 1781.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Nelson County (Va.) Land Records, 1808-1932, consist of a Daily Index of Receipts of Deeds for Recordation, General Indexes to Deeds, General Indexes to Deeds-- Grantors and Grantees (A-K and L-Z), a General Index to Deeds, a General Index to Deed Books, Campbell's Indexes to Deeds and General Indexes to Deeds Nos. 1 and 2.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Nelson County Court Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia's web site.
